title: Parasite
desc: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.
Two soldiers go on a dangerous mission during World War I.

title: Joker
desc: A failed comedian transforms into a violent criminal.

title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
desc: A fading TV actor and his stunt double navigate the changing film industry in 1969 Los Angeles.

title: The Irishman
desc: An aging hitman recounts his time working for the mob.

title: Ford v Ferrari
desc: Race-car designer and driver attempt to build a car to beat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans.

title: Avengers: Endgame
desc: The Avengers must stop Thanos from using the Infinity Stones to destroy the universe.

title: Marriage Story
desc: A couple goes through a grueling divorce while trying to maintain a relationship for the sake of their son.

title: Knives Out
desc: A detective investigates the death of a wealthy patriarch.

title: Little Women
desc: The March sisters navigate love and loss while coming of age in the late 1800s.
